ALAS2-2020-1574

Amazon Linux 2 Security Advisory: ALAS-2020-1574
Advisory Release Date: 2020-12-08 21:31 Pacific
Advisory Updated Date: 2020-12-08 22:43 Pacific
Severity: Important
References: CVE-2020-17507 
Issue Overview:

An issue was discovered in Qt through 5.12.9, and 5.13.x through 5.15.x before 5.15.1. read_xbm_body in gui/image/qxbmhandler.cpp has a buffer over-read. (CVE-2020-17507)


Affected Packages:

qt, qt5-qtbase


Issue Correction:
Run yum update qt to update your system.
Run yum update qt5-qtbase to update your system.

New Packages:

    qt5-qtbase-5.9.2-3.amzn2.0.4.aarch64
